name: Keep Moving Forward (Spikira)
description:
The first game I've ever completed, Keep Moving Forward! It's a topdown shooter where you play as a tank that can only move forward and strafe. It was cobbled together in a month as a break from my main project. It's definitely not the easiest game and could be improved, but as a game completed in one month I think it's pretty good.

This project was made in the Solarus Engine.

Note about controls:

You configure the controls the first time you start the game; if you want to reconfigure simply hit the 'Backspace' key on the title screen, then relaunch the game.

Graphics (fonts, sprites, etc.), level design, programming and music were all done by me. Sound effects were made in sfxr and FamiTracker.
